name: Inevitable (Tuna Pamir)
description:
Inevitable is a story based 3-match game made with Puzzle Script.

Game is developed in 20 hours [at] Istanbul Bilgi University Game Design departments Game Jam 01.

All Sounds and Graphcis are constructed inside PuzzleScript.

How To Play

- Use Arrows Keys To Collect C04 / CO2 elements and match them with O3
- Enemy Objects have tendency to follow player object.
- Enemy Objects move randomly each time the player makes an action.
- When enemy objects and unpassable tiles surround player, game ends press "R" to reset the level and continue.
- Each level the density of the enemy elements will increase.

Hack The Game [at] https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=e1839be9d76f8b754769d92a3700ccf3
